msg.msgText: A method called to create a durable subscription failed because the connection has a generated client ID.

msgExplanation.p: A non-shared durable subscriber can be created only on an IBM WIoTP Message Gateway connection with a client ID that is set in the connection factory administered object, or by calling setClientID() on the Connection object.

msgUserResponse.p: When using non-shared durable subscriptions, ensure that the client ID value for a connection was set in the connection factory administered object, or by calling setClientID() on the Connection object.
